channel.title: Coastal Monitoring on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Coastal Monitoring on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Fisheries and Marine Resource Management
item.description:
What you can do

  • Fisheries surveys and logbooks
  • Coastal habitat and erosion monitoring
  • Marine resource mapping and compliance

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare layers and forms in QGIS and keep teams aligned with QFieldCloud sync.
